actions.description: Distributors can use this action to create a new change subscription request. The asset identifier can be passed from previous datapills.

actions.name: Create a Purchase Request
actions.description: Distributors can use this action to create a purchase subscription request. This action has line items support to add multiple items or set multiple parameters (order type).

actions.name: Create a Suspend/Resume Asset Request
actions.description: Distributors can use this action to create a suspend or resume fulfillment request and subsequently suspend or resume required subscription. Note that the asset identifier can be passed from previous datapills.

actions.name: Change a Helpdesk Case State
actions.description: Allows assignging pending, resolved, or inquiring status to a helpdesk case on the CloudBlue Connect. Note that the case identifier can be passed from previous datapills.

actions.name: Change a Listing Request State
actions.description: Use this action to change the status of your listing requests and consequently to complete this request.

actions.name: Create a Billing Request
actions.description: This action allows creating a new billing request object on the Connect platform.

actions.name: Helpdesk Case Creation
actions.description: Use this action to create a new helpdesk case on the Connect platform. Your case may (or may not) be related to a particular Product.

actions.name: Create a Helpdesk Comment
actions.description: Allows creating a comment within your selected Helpdesk Case.

actions.name: Custom action
actions.description: Custom action in CloudBlue Connect

actions.name: Populate Asset Request Parameters
actions.description: Vendors can use this action to provide values for fulfillment parameters for subscription requests in the pending state. Furthermore, by using line items support, it is possible to populate such parameters dynamically.

actions.name: Get Usage Records
actions.description: Use this action to locate required usage record objects on the Connect platform.

actions.name: Ignore a Tier Account Request
actions.description: Vendors can use this action to ignore a tier account request in the pending state.

actions.name: Set the Inquire status to an Asset Request
actions.description: Vendors can use this action to moves the request to the inquire state, allowing technical contact to populate parameters marked as error.

actions.name: Reject an Asset Request
actions.description: This action allows rejecting a particular subscription request.

actions.name: Reject a Tier Configuration Request
actions.description: Vendors can use this action to reject a tier configuration request.

actions.name: Locate Assets

actions.name: Append247 (Email)
actions.description: Append247 (Email) appends email addresses for your contacts. You supply names and addresses or their phone numbers, and api will return their email addresses.

actions.name: Append247 (Gender)
actions.description: Append247 (Gender) returns the probable gender associated with a name.

actions.name: Append247 (Name)
actions.description: Append247 (Name) takes phone as input and returns name of person behind it.

actions.name: Append247 (Phone)
actions.description: Append247 (Phone) appends phone number for your contacts. You supply names and addresses of your contacts, and api will return their phone.

actions.name: Append247 (Profile Data)
actions.description: Our Append247 (Profile Data) service gives you additional information about the people on your lead list, including Financial, Interests, and/or Household data.

actions.name: Append247 (Reverse Email)
actions.description: Append247 (Reverse Phone) finds the name and address associated with a phone number.

actions.name: Append247 (Reverse Phone)
actions.description: Append247 (Reverse Phone) finds the name and address associated with a phone number.

actions.name: Append247 (Reverse Zipcode)
actions.description: Append247 (Reverse Zipcode) takes a 5 or 9 digit zipcode, and returns the formatted address components(address, city, state etc) of that location.

actions.name: Append247 (Zipcode)
actions.description: Append247 (Zipcode) appends 9-digit zipcodes for your contacts. You supply the addresses, and the api will return their zip code and other information.

actions.name: Carrier247 (International)
actions.description: Carrier247 (International)returns carrier information for international phone numbers, including whether they are wireless or landline numbers.You must provide country code in your phone number.

actions.name: Text@
actions.description: Text@ retrieves the Carrier name, iswireless, email-to-SMS, and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for your wireless phone numbers.

actions.name: Carrier247 (Carrier Type)
actions.description: Carrier247 (Carrier Type) is similar to Carrier247 (USA), but only returns a subset of the data (just the carrier type), and it works for Canadian phone numbers as well as USA without the requirement that the user subscribe to the CLNPC to get port corrected results.

actions.name: Do-Not-Call (USA)
actions.description: DNC Check returns whether a phone number exists in your internal dnc list OR in Federal Do-Not-Call list.

actions.name: Locate247 (IP)
actions.description: Locate247 (IP) returns the geolocation data for IP addresses.

actions.name: Trust247 (Phone Number)
actions.description: Trust247 (Phone Number) takes phone number as input and returns whether it's on a list of SPAM callers.

actions.name: Carrier247 (USA)
actions.description: Carrier247 (USA) returns Carrier name, iswireless, email-to-SMS, and email-to-MMS gateway addresses for provided domestic US phone numbers.

actions.name: Verify247 (Postal Address)
actions.description: Verify247 (Postal Address) verifies provided USA postal addresses and parses out to different address components.

actions.name: Verify247 (Email)
actions.description: Verify247 (Email) will verify that each of your email address is properly formatted and there is a working mailbox associated with it.

actions.name: Verify247 (Phone Number)
actions.description: Verify247 (Phone Number) will verify that each of the provided phone is active or not.
